@prax83: tpb clipped my comment.....lol
inorder to remove the subs permanently use 
mkvmergeGUI
http://www.videohelp.com/tools/MKVtoolnix
open d file in the software and u'll c three tracks (a/v/subs)
uncheck the subtitles check and click 'Start Muxing'
u'll get a whole new file without subs in a minute...dis shud work in your case
if u still hav any prob pop me wit ur email id i'll get back to u 
:)
